Package test.mocking

Classes for mocking: replace classes in the tested environment with ones provided by the test.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MockCompiler
    Helper class to compile a MockerJavaSourceFile.
    MockCompilerFileManager
    File manager to handle the compilation results from MockCompiler.
    MockerJavaClassFile
    Compiled java byte code suitable to mock the class names MockerJavaClassFile.getName().
    MockerJavaSourceFile
    Java source code meant to mock another class.
    SerializableByteArrayOutputStream
    A very simple wrapper for an ByteArrayOutputStream that is serialisable.

Package test.mocking Description

Classes for mocking: replace classes in the tested environment with ones provided by the test.
Since:
04.02.2015
Version:
1.0
Author:
Joshua Gleitze
